subject: Re: Regarding report creation using "Ant" from Testsuite execution of "JUnit"
msgSnippet: Hi, Can you explain what information you need. Creating the report is not difficult: You run your testsuite with Ant s JUnit task, and create a report with the
messageBody:
Hi,

Can you explain what information you need.
Creating the report is not difficult:
You run your testsuite with Ant's JUnit task, and create a report
with the JUnitReport task.

More info on IBM developerWorks Automating the build and test process:
http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-junitmail/
Read the Automating data reports section.

Regards, Jan

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Sachu Joseph <sajumon_joseph@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All,
>
>
> I have a doubt in report generation using ANT tool from
the Suite execution result in JUnit.
>
> So anybody please help me in this problem...
>
